tool_description: Unleash the World of Manga with MangaVerse API!  Discover a captivating universe of manga from Japan, Korea, and China, all conveniently translated into English.
name: MangaVerse API
title: MangaVerse API

api_list.name: Fetch Manga
api_list.description:
This will get the list of manga on this server
page should be 1 or more than 1 and the genres should be string with comma
genres ex: Harem,Fantasy

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Please chose from all, japan, china, korea default value its: all

optional_parameters.name: nsfw
optional_parameters.description: True if you want to get all manga that nsfw or not nsfw, use false if you just want get the non nsfw Manga

api_list.name: Fetch Chapters
api_list.description:
This will get all the chapters list from the manga 
id should be manga id

api_list.name: Get Manga
api_list.description:
Get manga details 
id should be manga id

api_list.name: Search Manga
api_list.description: Fetch manga base on the text, text will be include from title and sub title

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Please chose from all, japan, china, korea default value its: all

optional_parameters.name: nsfw
optional_parameters.description: True if you want to get all manga that nsfw or not nsfw, use false if you just want get the non nsfw Manga

api_list.name: Fetch Latest
api_list.description:
This will get the latest of the updated manga on this server
page should be 1 or more than 1 and the genres should be string with comma
genres ex: Harem,Fantasy

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Please chose from all, japan, china, korea default value its: all

optional_parameters.name: nsfw
optional_parameters.description: True if you want to get all manga that nsfw or not nsfw, use false if you just want get the non nsfw Manga

api_list.name: Fetch Images
api_list.description:
This will be get the image from the chapters, the image sort base on the index
so make sure you sort base from index if you manipulate it,
id should be chapter id
